business.headline: Sensex, Nifty rise as markets bet on Budget 2025 for growth push; L&T up 5%The S&P BSE Sensex was up 161.56 points to 76,921.37, while the NSE Nifty added 64.60 points to 23,314.10 as of 9:25 AM.

Nirmala Sitharaman to present Economic Survey today. Check key detailsUnion Budget 2025: The Economic Survey is an important document that reviews the country's financial health over the past year and provides insights into economic trends, challenges, and opportunities.

Union Budget 2025 Expectations Live Updates: Economic Survey to be tabled todayBudget 2025 Expectations Live Updates: Budget 2025 is expected to give tax relief and help boost its overall growth with the GDP showing signs of a slowdown.

Budget session 2025: Where to watch Finance Minister's speech live Budget 2025: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is set to present the Union Budget 2025 on February 1. This will be her eighth consecutive Budget speech.

Budget 2025: Will 25% tax rate and fresh deductions be announced under new regime?The government might extend the tax exemption for individual contributions to NPS under the new tax regime, along with several other projected deductions.

Budget 2025: Can AI and better financing transform education sector?Union Budget 2025: Experts anticipate that Budget 2025 would focus on AI-driven academic programs along with increased allocations for student loans and decreasing rates on education loans.

Sensex, Nifty end higher but IT, auto stocks limit gains; Tata Motors down 7%The S&P BSE Sensex gained 226.85 points to close at 76,759.81, while the NSE Nifty50 added 86.40 points to end at 23,249.50.

Budget 2025: 5 exemptions that are available under new tax regimeUnion Budget 2025: To make the new tax regime more attractive for the taxpayers, the government has raised the standard deduction to Rs 75,000 from Rs 50,000.

Budget 2025: Will government raise basic exemption limit and cut income tax?Union Budget 2025: With inflation and the rising cost of living affecting household budgets, many are expecting the government to introduce income tax cuts, higher deductions, and a more simplified tax structure.

Why did Sebi cancel registration of 4 stock brokers? Check hereIn four separate orders, Sebi (Securities and Exchange Board of India) explained the main reason for the cancellation of the four stock brokers.

Budget 2025: Will defence, railway sectors get a big boost?Union Budget 2025 is likely to provide enhanced support for modernisation of the defence forces, strengthening naval assets and promoting domestic manufacturing.

Budget 2025: These 5 popular deductions are not available under new tax regime  Budget 2025: Interest incurred on home loans is a popular deduction available under Section 24(b) in the old tax regime. However, the same is not included under the new tax regime.

Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 9% today Tata Motors stock price: The stock hit the day's low of Rs 684.25. Jefferies downgraded Tata Motors from 'buy' to 'underperform'. The firm also reduced its price target to Rs 660 from Rs 930.

Sensex, Nifty open flat as market awaits cues from Budget, US Fed's next moveStock Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up by 33.36 points to 76,566.32, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 34.50 points to 23,197.60 as of 9:30 AM.

Dr Agarwals Healthcare IPO: Should you subscribe? Check latest GMPDr Agarwals Healthcare IPO aims to raise Rs 3,027.26 crore through a combination of fresh issue of 75 lakh shares and an offer for sale of 6.78 crore shares.

Shares of Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports to be in focus today. Here's whyAdani Enterprises reported a rise in profit in Q3 FY24. The company posted a 2.3 times year-on-year (YoY) jump in consolidated net profit.

Axis Bank launches Devanagari PIN for safer banking. Here's how it worksAxis Bank has unveiled the Devanagari PIN, blending technology and tradition to create a banking PIN that's as personal as your favourite memory, but much harder for cyber criminals to crack.

Even Bihar beats Punjab, Andhra, Haryana in fiscal health, shows Niti reportPunjab, Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal, Kerala and Haryana are at the bottom of the Niti Aayog's list on fiscal health. Bihar, an earlier Bimaru state, has managed to outpace its richer counterparts in fiscal discipline. Odisha tops the list among states with the best fiscal management, and is followed by Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh, two surprise states.

Budget 2025: Will Mahila Samman Savings Certificate get an extension?Union Budget 2025: Mahila Samman Savings Certificate has played a key role in encouraging savings among women from the lower-income group and promoting women's empowerment.

What is 'concert economy' that PM Modi mentioned after Coldplay's India showsRock band Coldplay set a new record for the largest stadium concert of the 21st century on January 25-26, drawing over 2 lakh fans in Ahmedabad, surpassing George Strait's Texas record of 1,10,905 attendees.

entertainment.headline: Ed Sheeran wows fans in Pune concert, celebrates his return to India. WatchBritish singer Ed Sheeran kick-started his Indian leg of the Mathematics Tour on January 30. His first stop was Pune, where the singer enthralled fans with his performance.

Rapper Raftaar to marry stylist Manraj Jawanda? Viral videos, pics spark buzzSinger and rapper Raftaar is reportedly set to marry for the second time. Pictures and videos from his pre-wedding festivities are going viral, fuelling speculation about the wedding.

Coldplay breaks world record for highest tour attendance, surpassing Taylor SwiftColdplay's Music of the Spheres tour set a record for the highest attendance in music tour history, surpassing the total audience of Taylor Swift's The Eras Tour.

Ashneer Grover to host new OTT reality show Rise and Fall. Watch teaserShark Tank India's Ashneer Grover will host MX Player's reality show, Rise and Fall, where 16 contestants battle for power in a divided house. Watch the teaser of the show here.

Squid Game season 3 new visuals out, series to release on June 27After a super successful season 2, South Korean show Squid Game has been renewed for a third season. The release date is now out, and the series will stream on Netflix from June 27.

Sonu Nigam on AR Rahman: Great composer but not a great singerSonu Nigam says AR Rahman is a great composer but not a great singer. He praises Rahman's secure approach and recalls composing a part of Inn Lamhon Ke Daaman Mein from Jodha Akbar.

Grammy-winning singer SZA on stay at Isha Foundation: No words for my experienceGrammy-winning artist SZA recently visited the Isha Foundation in Coimbatore. She also shared a post on Instagram where she described her trip and called it a deeply impactful experience.

KBC's 1st crorepati Harshvardhan Nawathe: Got many marriage proposals, crazy callsKBC's first crorepati, Harshvardhan Nawathe, reflects on his journey, missed acting opportunities, crazy fan moments, and life post-win as the Amitabh Bachchan-hosted show celebrates its 25th anniversary.
Poonam Pandey takes holy dip in Maha Kumbh 2025: Sab paap dhul gayeActor Poonam Pandey visited Maha Kumbh and took a holy dip. She shared glimpses from her visit on Instagram.

Pushpa 2 Reloaded on OTT: When and where to watch Allu Arjun's film in HindiPushpa 2 OTT release: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's Pushpa 2: The Rule (Reloaded Version) has made its way to the small screens. The film, with 24 minutes of additional footage, has finally been released on OTT.

Anuja on OTT: When and where to watch Priyanka Chopra-backed Oscar-nominated filmOscar-nominated film Anuja is set to premiere globally on Netflix. Backed by Priyanka Chopra and Guneet Monga among others, the movie will stream next week.

Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce plan to buy a house in Kansas City: ReportTaylor Swift and Travis Kelce are reportedly exploring an opportunity to buy a house in Kansas City. Recently, reports about their engagement have been doing the rounds.

KBC 16: Samay Raina jokes about Big B's Sooryavansham, recalls sneaking into JalsaKBC 16: Amitabh Bachchan recently welcomed content creators Samay Raina, Tanmay Bhat, and Bhuvan Bam on Kaun Banega Crorepati 16. In a viral video from the show, Samay's hilarious banter with Amitabh Bachchan left fans in splits.

Bigg Boss's Mahira Sharma dating cricketer Mohammed Siraj? Her mother reactsTV actor Mahira Sharma's mother denies rumours of her daughter dating cricketer Mohammed Siraj. The cricketer was previously rumoured to be dating Asha Bhosle's granddaughter Zanai.

Watch: New docuseries on Asaram Bapu throws spotlight on India's 'darkest scandal'A new docuseries, Cult of Fear: Asaram Bapu, is currently streaming on Discovery +. The series explores the controversial case surrounding the self-proclaimed Godman.

Actor Gabriel Macht feels sorry for those who go to law school after watching SuitsSuits star Gabriel Macht said he always feels the need to apologise to people who decided to enroll in a law school after watching his hit TV series, Suits.

Sivarapalli review: Rag Mayur's Panchayat remake fails to pass authenticity testReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025Sivarapalli, the official Telugu remake of the popular series Panchayat, is currently streaming on Prime Video. While the show features strong performances from actors Rag Mayur, Sunny Palle and Muralidhar Goud, it gives a sense of déjà vu throughout.

The Storyteller review: Satyajit Ray's vintage storytelling at its most beautifulReleased-Tue Jan 28, 2025The Storyteller is derived from Satyajit Ray's short story. It features Paresh Rawal and Adil Hussain in the pivotal roles, but it's the stories told in the film and the essence of storytelling that elevate the film.

general news.headline: Parliament Budget session from today, Finance Minister to table Economic SurveyThe Budget Session of Parliament will begin with President Droupadi Murmu addressing a joint sitting of both Houses. The session will run in two phases from January 31 to April 4.

Trump threatens 'hostile' BRICS against replacing US dollar: Find another suckerUS President Donald Trump declared that he would impose 100 per cent tariffs on any BRICS country that takes steps toward abandoning the US dollar.

Sanjay Raut claims 'some in BJP' want alliance with Uddhav Sena, Fadnavis retortsMaharashtra Politics: Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sanjay claimed that some leaders from the BJP and from the Uddhav Thackeray-led party wanted to join hands again. However, Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis rejected Raut's claims.

H-1B in crosshairs in US again after China's DeepSeek successChina's success in building DeepSeek R1 AI with home-grown talent has renewed the debate over H-1B visas that US tech giants used to hire temporary workers, especially from India. Though DeepSeek AI is being used to bash the hiring of Indians through H-1B, there is more to the debate that is lost on myopic eyes.

Can Trump and Modi really be 'dear friends'?  There has even been the suggestion that Modi and Trump are made for each other, two strongmen politicians with a flair for populist demagoguery and prime time showmanship.

Indian astronaut to pilot Axiom-4 plans to do yoga, serve desi food to colleaguesIAF Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla is set to enter into the history books as the first Indian astronaut to travel to the International Space Station. He will pilot the Axiom-4 mission.

Delhi will resume their first innings on 41/1 on Day 2 after bundling out Railways for 241 on Day 1.

Tulsi Gabbard slams Democrats over 'Putin, Modi' puppet charge in fiery speechTulsi Gabbard, Trump's nominee for national intelligence director, dismissed claims she is a puppet for global leaders. She accused Democratic senators of religious bigotry against Hindus during her confirmation hearing. Senators questioned her past remarks on Russia and Syria.

Rural parents prefer private schools, but digital literacy lagsPrivate schools are increasingly popular in rural India, with enrolment rising since 2006. However, government school enrolments surged during the pandemic before returning to pre-pandemic levels in 2024. Girls' education has improved but faces challenges, especially in certain states with high dropout rates.

Josh Inglis becomes 1st Australian in 10 years to hit hundred on Test debut Sri Lanka vs Australia, 1st Test: Josh Inglis became the first Australian batter in 10 years to hit a hundred on Test debut. The 29-year-old got to his maiden three-figure score in just 90 balls as Australia went past 600 in their first innings.

In-form Shardul Thakur takes hat-trick, KL Rahul out for 26 on comebackRanji Trophy 2024-25: Shardul Thakur, who hit a hundred for Mumbai earlier in January, took a hat-trick against Meghalaya in the final round of Ranji Trophy group stages. NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
